articles.author: Kimmy Yam
articles.title: MIT is first school to reject Trump administration's agenda in exchange for funding benefits - NBC News
articles.description: The Massachusetts Institute of Technology on Friday became the first school to reject an offer of federal funds in exchange for agreeing to the Trump administration's education agenda
articles.content:
The Massachusetts Institute of Technology on Friday became the first school to reject an offer of federal funds in exchange for agreeing to the Trump administration's education agenda.
MIT disagreed… [+3098 chars]
